REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1901 reute r f BC-SYNERGEN-<SYGN>-FILES 04-08 0058

TEXT.TITLE: SYNERGEN <SYGN> FILES TO OFFER SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Synergen Inc said it has filed for an offering of 1,500,000 common shares through underwriters led by Alex. Brown Inc <ABSB>, Hambrecht and Quist Inc and Boettcher and Co Inc. It said proceeds will be used to fund research and testing and for other general corporate purposes. Reuter
